ygData.subject: RE: Re: Mid-level songs
ygData.msgSnippet: it is a singing song only.  i assume twisting will slow it down slightly, as its pulses will be a bit further apart.  i very rarely play this other than after
ygData.messageBody:
it is a singing song only. i assume twisting will slow it down slightly, as
its pulses will be a bit further apart. i very rarely play this other than
after a fight during rest. during the battle the song just can't keep up
with the mana use of the casters. maybe in really desparate cases i'll
start it up in a fight just in case someone can get one extra heal off.
basically i do my normal in fight stuff (whatever that may be for each of
us) and then play mana song alone during rest. it is usually in the hands
of the healers to get your health back up. i have used hymn very rarely
since level 32 if healers are in the group, which they usually have to be
if you are doing anything remotely dangerous hehe.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
Erisi Dlarit, Level 21 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr



>
> From: mike st denis <f_one_@...>
>
> I have a couple question about mana song.I have just
> reached 32 level and wanted to know the do`s and dont
> of this song.Does an instrument make it more powerful
> than just singing?Dose twisting with other song effect
> its help of mana recovery? Can it be twisted in battle
> to help mana recovery ?
> Basicly i just want to no what other bards are doing?
>
